DataElement.preferredName: Brief Fatigue Inventory Worst Fatigue Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score pertaining to the worst fatigue score on the 9-item questionnaire, developed by Cleeland and Mendoza, designed to assess the severity of fatigue and the impact of fatigue on daily functioning in cancer patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Brief Fatigue Inventory Worst Fatigue Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to the worst fatigue score on the 9-item questionnaire, developed by Cleeland and Mendoza, designed to assess the severity of fatigue and the impact of fatigue on daily functioning in cancer patients.

Property.preferredDefinition: To the highest degree of inferiority or badness; the least favorable outcome.:Overall tiredness and lack of energy.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
